snippet: The unexpected announcement came two days after federal authorities filed criminal and civil charges against the hedge fund.
abstract: Hedge fund Visium Asset Management, facing insider trading charges, will shut down; plans to sell one fund to AllianceBernstein and return money from three others to investors.
lead_paragraph: The unexpected announcement came two days after federal authorities filed criminal and civil charges against the hedge fund.

headline.main: Visium to Sell and Liquidate Funds After Insider Trading Charges
headline.print_headline: Facing Insider Charges, Hedge Fund to Shut Down
